ResearchProjectDef.label: blaster technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create basic energy weapons that fire concentrated plasma bolts. These weapons are standard throughout the galaxy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: lightsaber crafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Master the ancient art of lightsaber construction. Requires deep understanding of kyber crystals and the Force to create these elegant weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: holographic technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop advanced holographic projection systems for communication, entertainment, and data storage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: dwarven engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the lost technology of the Dwemer race. Learn to create their intricate mechanical devices and automatons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: daedric smithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the dark art of forging weapons and armor imbued with daedric power. These items are among the finest that can be created.

ResearchProjectDef.label: telvanni architecture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Master the unique building techniques of House Telvanni, learning to grow and shape living structures using a combination of magic and nature.

ResearchProjectDef.label: multiversal studies
ResearchProjectDef.description: Begin to understand the connections between different universes and realities. This opens up possibilities for advanced cross-dimensional technologies.
